divs: sighting detailsi was up late studying for school and walked outside to fill the cats water bowl before bed. i looked out into the distance and saw this cylinder like shaped object hovering in the sky. at first i thought it was a planet because of the size being larger than a typical star. however, after further observation i noticed the object began to sway back and forth then stopped and periodically ascended and descended in a fast motion. i have never seen any plane or helicopter move the way this object had. wondering if any one else saw the same thing. i didn't stay up for more than 1 to 1 1\2 hours after initial sighting to see it disappear. i had continuous sight of the object up until the point when i went to bed around 4:30 or 5:00am. i tried to record the sighting on my phone and it would not pick up on the camera.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Evans
There were 11 other sightings in Evans on or around June 28th 2012
Summary: Shaped like a cylinder emitted blue red white lights with red ring aura hovered with periodic ascending and descending
